name: WebRence
description:
We are a young and powerful team of coders! Our technical expertise in various technologies and frameworks are as follow.
Web Design - Wordpress, Drupal, Magento
Programming - Angular JS, Java, PHP, Python, .Net
Mobile Apps- iOS Development, Android Development, Xamarin
Data Migration - AWS, Parse, Google Cloud, MS Azure
Big Data - Hadoop, MongoDB, Cassandra
Co sourcing - Java Developer, .Net Developer, IOS Developer, Android Developer, PHP Developer 
Fact Sheet:
Free 60 days support post release
Started in 2009 with 1 person only
Executed more than 100 projects
25+ employees with different skills
Strategic partners in 4 countries and total 11 locations worldwide.
We usually have agility in our process and methodology however sometimes we use a hybrid model of SDLC & SCRUM in order to reduce communication & get more productions smoothly.
